content:
I am looking for a PhD student interested in working on constructive higher category theory. Detailed proposal: https://www.cse.chalmers.se/~sattler/phd-proposal.pdf

This is part of a departmental recruitment drive (deadline August 20): https://web103.reachmee.com/ext/I005/1035/job?site=7&validator=9b89bead79bb7258ad55c8d75228e5b7&job_id=31163

Selected applicants receive a full time employment at the University of Gothenburg with a competitive salary (5 years, 20% teaching). Employment in Sweden carries all the usual health and pension benefits, paid holidays, etc.

Please contact me with your questions: sattler@chalmers.se
